txt.en: You have become a proficient Apprentice Tailor! You can now obtain <rgb=#00FF00>Critical Success</rgb> results from Apprentice Tailor recipes, and can use <rgb=#00FF00>Optional Ingredients</rgb> to improve your critical success chance.\n\nYou may now use Journeyman Tailor recipes, or continue to work towards completing Apprentice Tailor mastery.
